about_the_game:
A Minimalist 2D Lite Action Plat-Former.  The Machines attack!  And, if they win, our world will never have been...

Shoot, Punch, Smash, Deflect and fight through a gauntlet of 52 levels against the soulless steel walkers and their twisted minions.  The war for reality is being waged on the meta-physical planes of the Astral Void, where Magic and Technology, Flesh and Steel and... Life and Death meet.

GEMS are LIFE! GEMS are POWER!  Your MIND, your WILL and the POWER of the GEMS are interlinked, sown and woven to and through the tapestry of reality.  Without them, there is nothing.  A threat from another time, another reality has appeared!  Consuming and assimilating all in their path, leaving nothing of what once was.  Machines!  cold and soulless, merciless and unstoppable...Will you be the immovable force that breaks their assault and saves reality?

  • Use the POWER of the GEMS to BLAST the enemy to pieces!

  • ABSORB attacks to regain GEMS and DEFLECT to give the enemy a taste of their own medicine!

  • PUNCH thru your foes! PUNCH thru walls, Ceilings and Floors and whatever else that can't handle your POWER!

  • Exercise your IRON WILL and fight through a GAUNTLET of 52 progressively challenging levels in the Astral Void to save your friends, yourself and reality!

  • 15 different enemy types ready to break your WILL and destroy your REALITY!

    You are GEMMA, soldier of the ORDER of the GEM, final guards against threats to the infinite universe and human reality, and you alone are their last hope. The soulless, devouring metal machine gods are here, waging war on the Astral Void, ready to take everything and leave nothing. The fight for existence and being awaits... Are you made of FLESH or STEEL?

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon blood and gore, some nudity.

name: Gemmas Gauntlet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: intel core i5, amd ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: amd radeon vega, intel iRIS xe
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: A Minimalist 2D Lite Action Plat-Former.  You are Gemma, soldier of the Order of the GEM. Iron Will, Power Gauntlet in hand, you must shoot, punch, smash, deflect and fight through 52 levels of challenges against the soulless machines and their evil minions. Are you made of Flesh or Steel?
